scripts.dev:desktop:full: npm run dev:web & npm run dev:desktop
scripts.desktop:prod: npm run build -w @kira/web && npm run build -w @kira/desktop && npm run start -w @kira/desktop
scripts.desktop:build: npm run build -w @kira/web && npm run build -w @kira/desktop
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:web
scripts.test:integration: RUN_INTEGRATION=1 TOKEN=dev-token API=http://localhost:4000 MOCK_XAI=1 npm run test -w @kira/tests
scripts.typecheck:all: tsc -p apps/web/tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p backend/tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p convex/tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p packages/shared/tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.test:core: npm run test -w @kira/shared --if-present && npm run test -w @kira/tests --if-present
